Texts.Chs: 一支绘世者等离子枪，退役后用于展示。
Texts.Eng: A Skath Plasma Spear, decommissioned for display.

Texts.Chs: 圆滑的长矛。我不想被这些东西击中。
Texts.Eng: A sleek lookin' spear. Wouldn't want to get hit by one of those.

Texts.Chs: 我不知道这把矛是不是假的。
Texts.Eng: I can't tell if this spear is a fake or not.

Texts.Chs: 等离子矛传统上用于水下作战。长矛已经证明在水下非常有效。
Texts.Eng: Plasma spears are traditionaly used for underwater combat. Spears have proven themselves to be very effective underwater.

Texts.Chs: 绘世者长矛看起来很吓人。我们的矛匠可以从他们身上学到很多东西。
Texts.Eng: Skath spears look intimidating. Our spearsmiths could learn a lot from them.

Texts.Chs: 这把矛看起来格外锋利。我不想被那些东西击中。
Texts.Eng: This spear looks extraordinarily sharp. I wouldn't want to get hit by one of those.

Texts.Chs: 多尖的矛啊！非常适合用矛捕鱼！。
Texts.Eng: What a pointy looking spear! Perfect for spear fishing!.
